Configuration.StudyNameEntrez: Genomic Sequencing of Solitary Fibrous Tumors
Configuration.StudyNameReportPage: Genomic Sequencing of Solitary Fibrous Tumors
Configuration.Description: Solitary fibrous tumors (SFTs) are rare mesenchymal tumors that can be benign or malignant. In this study, we sequenced and analyzed the exomes of 17 SFT matched tumor and normal pairs. This study appertains to a large endeavor to characterize cancers as part of the Slim Initiative for Genomic Medicine in the Americas (SIGMA) project.
Configuration.StudyInEx: Participants were eligible for inclusion in this study only if their SFT was treatment naive.

ParticipantSet.UseLimitation: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the standard Data Use Certification. The data will only be used for research purposes. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
